mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (m_code, m_id, m_password, m_name, m_address, m_phonenum, m_gender, m_nickname, m_hobby) values ( #{m_code}, #{m_id}, #{m_password}, #{m_name}, #{m_address}, #{m_phonenum}, #{m_gender}, #{m_nickname}, #{m_hobby})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE m_id=#{m_id} AND m_password=#{m_password}
SELECT m_id,m_password FROM MEMBER WHERE m_id=#{m_id} AND m_password=#{m_password}
SELECT COUNT(m_id) FROM MEMBER WHERE m_id=#{m_id}
